00369     public static function extract($path, $data = null, $options = array()) {
00370         if (is_string($data)) {
00371             $tmp = $data;
00372             $data = $path;
00373             $path = $tmp;
00374         }
00375         if (strpos($path, '/') === false) {
00376             return MOC_Array::classicExtract($data, $path);
00377         }
00378         if (empty($data)) {
00379             return array();
00380         }
00381         if ($path === '/') {
00382             return $data;
00383         }
00384         $contexts = $data;
00385         $options = array_merge(array('flatten' => true), $options);
00386         if (!isset($contexts[0])) {
00387             $current = current($data);
00388             if ((is_array($current) && count($data) <= 1) || !is_array($current) || !MOC_Array::numeric(array_keys($data))) {
00389                 $contexts = array($data);
00390             }
00391         }
00392         $tokens = array_slice(preg_split('/(?<!=)\/(?![a-z-]*\])/', $path), 1);
00393 
00394         do {
00395             $token = array_shift($tokens);
00396             $conditions = false;
00397             if (preg_match_all('/\[([^=]+=\/[^\/]+\/|[^\]]+)\]/', $token, $m)) {
00398                 $conditions = $m[1];
00399                 $token = substr($token, 0, strpos($token, '['));
00400             }
00401             $matches = array();
00402             foreach ($contexts as $key => $context) {
00403                 if (!isset($context['trace'])) {
00404                     $context = array('trace' => array(null), 'item' => $context, 'key' => $key);
00405                 }
00406                 if ($token === '..') {
00407                     if (count($context['trace']) == 1) {
00408                         $context['trace'][] = $context['key'];
00409                     }
00410                     $parent = join('/', $context['trace']) . '/.';
00411                     $context['item'] = MOC_Array::extract($parent, $data);
00412                     $context['key'] = array_pop($context['trace']);
00413                     if (isset($context['trace'][1]) && $context['trace'][1] > 0) {
00414                         $context['item'] = $context['item'][0];
00415                     } else
00416                         if (!empty($context['item'][$key])) {
00417                             $context['item'] = $context['item'][$key];
00418                         } else {
00419                             $context['item'] = array_shift($context['item']);
00420                         }
00421                         $matches[] = $context;
00422                     continue;
00423                 }
00424                 $match = false;
00425                 if ($token === '@*' && is_array($context['item'])) {
00426                     $matches[] = array('trace' => array_merge($context['trace'], (array )$key), 'key' => $key, 'item' => array_keys($context['item']), );
00427                 } elseif (is_array($context['item']) && array_key_exists($token, $context['item'])) {
00428                     $items = $context['item'][$token];
00429                     if (!is_array($items)) {
00430                         $items = array($items);
00431                     } elseif (!isset($items[0])) {
00432                         $current = current($items);
00433                         if ((is_array($current) && count($items) <= 1) || !is_array($current)) {
00434                             $items = array($items);
00435                         }
00436                     }
00437 
00438                     foreach ($items as $key => $item) {
00439                         $ctext = array($context['key']);
00440                         if (!is_numeric($key)) {
00441                             $ctext[] = $token;
00442                             $token = array_shift($tokens);
00443                             if (isset($items[$token])) {
00444                                 $ctext[] = $token;
00445                                 $item = $items[$token];

00447                                 break;
00448                             } else {
00449                                 array_unshift($tokens, $token);
00450                             }
00451                         } else {
00452                             $key = $token;
00453                         }
00454 
00455                         $matches[] = array('trace' => array_merge($context['trace'], $ctext), 'key' => $key, 'item' => $item, );
00456                     }
00457                 } elseif (($key === $token || (ctype_digit($token) && $key == $token) || $token === '.')) {
00458                     $context['trace'][] = $key;
00459                     $matches[] = array('trace' => $context['trace'], 'key' => $key, 'item' => $context['item'], );

00461             }

00463                 foreach ($conditions as $condition) {
00464                     $filtered = array();

00503     public static function matches($conditions, $data = array(), $i = null, $length = null) {
00504         if (empty($conditions)) {
00505             return true;
00506         }
00507         if (is_string($conditions)) {
00508             return !!MOC_Array::extract($conditions, $data);
00509         }
00510         foreach ($conditions as $condition) {
00511             if ($condition === ':last') {
00512                 if ($i != $length) {
00513                     return false;
00514                 }
00515                 continue;
00516             } elseif ($condition === ':first') {
00517                 if ($i != 1) {
00518                     return false;
00519                 }
00520                 continue;
00521             }
00522             if (!preg_match('/(.+?)([><!]?[=]|[><])(.*)/', $condition, $match)) {
00523                 if (ctype_digit($condition)) {
00524                     if ($i != $condition) {
00525                         return false;
00526                     }
00527                 } elseif (preg_match_all('/(?:^[0-9]+|(?<=,)[0-9]+)/', $condition, $matches)) {
00528                     return in_array($i, $matches[0]);
00529                 } elseif (!array_key_exists($condition, $data)) {
00530                     return false;
00531                 }
00532                 continue;
00533             }
00534             list(, $key, $op, $expected) = $match;
00535             if (!isset($data[$key])) {
00536                 return false;
00537             }
00538 
00539             $val = $data[$key];
00540 
00541             if ($op === '=' && $expected && $expected{0} === '/') {
00542                 return preg_match($expected, $val);
00543             }
00544             if ($op === '=' && $val != $expected) {
00545                 return false;
00546             }
00547             if ($op === '!=' && $val == $expected) {
00548                 return false;
00549             }
00550             if ($op === '>' && $val <= $expected) {
00551                 return false;
00552             }
00553             if ($op === '<' && $val >= $expected) {
00554                 return false;
00555             }
00556             if ($op === '<=' && $val > $expected) {
00557                 return false;
00558             }
00559             if ($op === '>=' && $val < $expected) {
00560                 return false;
00561             }
00562         }
00563         return true;
00564     }

00578     public static function classicExtract($data, $path = null) {
00579         if (empty($path)) {
00580             return $data;
00581         }
00582         if (is_object($data)) {
00583             $data = get_object_vars($data);
00584         }
00585         if (!is_array($data)) {
00586             return $data;
00587         }
00588 
00589         if (!is_array($path)) {
00590             $path = MOC_String::tokenize($path, '.', '{', '}');
00591         }
00592         $tmp = array();
00593 
00594         if (!is_array($path) || empty($path)) {
00595             return null;
00596         }
00597 
00598         foreach ($path as $i => $key) {
00599             if (is_numeric($key) && intval($key) > 0 || $key === '0') {
00600                 if (isset($data[intval($key)])) {
00601                     $data = $data[intval($key)];
00602                 } else {
00603                     return null;
00604                 }
00605             } elseif ($key === '{n}') {
00606                 foreach ($data as $j => $val) {
00607                     if (is_int($j)) {
00608                         $tmpPath = array_slice($path, $i + 1);
00609                         if (empty($tmpPath)) {
00610                             $tmp[] = $val;
00611                         } else {
00612                             $tmp[] = MOC_Array::classicExtract($val, $tmpPath);
00613                         }
00614                     }
00615                 }
00616                 return $tmp;
00617             } elseif ($key === '{s}') {
00618                 foreach ($data as $j => $val) {
00619                     if (is_string($j)) {
00620                         $tmpPath = array_slice($path, $i + 1);
00621                         if (empty($tmpPath)) {
00622                             $tmp[] = $val;
00623                         } else {
00624                             $tmp[] = MOC_Array::classicExtract($val, $tmpPath);
00625                         }
00626                     }
00627                 }
00628                 return $tmp;
00629             } elseif (false !== strpos($key, '{') && false !== strpos($key, '}')) {
00630                 $pattern = substr($key, 1, -1);
00631 
00632                 foreach ($data as $j => $val) {
00633                     if (preg_match('/^' . $pattern . '/s', $j) !== 0) {
00634                         $tmpPath = array_slice($path, $i + 1);
00635                         if (empty($tmpPath)) {
00636                             $tmp[$j] = $val;
00637                         } else {
00638                             $tmp[$j] = MOC_Array::classicExtract($val, $tmpPath);
00639                         }
00640                     }
00641                 }
00642                 return $tmp;
00643             } else {
00644                 if (isset($data[$key])) {
00645                     $data = $data[$key];
00646                 } else {
00647                     return null;
00648                 }
00649             }
00650         }
00651         return $data;
00652     }

00678                     $_list[$key] = array();
00679                 }
00680                 $_list = &$_list[$key];
00681             }
00682         }
00683         return $list;

00700             $path = explode('.', $path);

00705             if (is_numeric($key) && intval($key) > 0 || $key === '0') {

00729     public static function check($data, $path = null) {
00730         if (empty($path)) {
00731             return $data;
00732         }
00733         if (!is_array($path)) {
00734             $path = explode('.', $path);
00735         }
00736 
00737         foreach ($path as $i => $key) {
00738             if (is_numeric($key) && intval($key) > 0 || $key === '0') {
00739                 $key = intval($key);
00740             }
00741             if ($i === count($path) - 1) {
00742                 return (is_array($data) && array_key_exists($key, $data));
00743             }
00744 
00745             if (!is_array($data) || !array_key_exists($key, $data)) {
00746                 return false;
00747             }
00748             $data = &$data[$key];
00749         }
00750         return true;

00762     public static function diff($val1, $val2 = null) {
00763         if (empty($val1)) {
00764             return (array )$val2;
00765         }
00766         if (empty($val2)) {
00767             return (array )$val1;
00768         }
00769         $out = array();
00770 
00771         foreach ($val1 as $key => $val) {
00772             $exists = array_key_exists($key, $val2);
00773 
00774             if ($exists && $val2[$key] != $val) {
00775                 $out[$key] = $val;
00776             } elseif (!$exists) {
00777                 $out[$key] = $val;
00778             }
00779             unset($val2[$key]);
00780         }
00781 
00782         foreach ($val2 as $key => $val) {
00783             if (!array_key_exists($key, $out)) {
00784                 $out[$key] = $val;
00785             }
00786         }
00787         return $out;
00788     }

00814             return false;

00817         foreach ($val2 as $key => $val) {
00818             if (is_numeric($key)) {
00819                 MOC_Array::contains($val, $val1);
00820             } else {
00821                 if (!isset($val1[$key]) || $val1[$key] != $val) {
00822                     return false;
00823                 }
00824             }
00825         }
00826         return true;
00827     }

00840     public static function countDim($array = null, $all = false, $count = 0) {
00841         if ($all) {
00842             $depth = array($count);
00843             if (is_array($array) && reset($array) !== false) {
00844                 foreach ($array as $value) {
00845                     $depth[] = MOC_Array::countDim($value, true, $count + 1);
00846                 }
00847             }
00848             $return = max($depth);
00849         } else {
00850             if (is_array(reset($array))) {
00851                 $return = MOC_Array::countDim(reset($array)) + 1;
00852             } else {
00853                 $return = 1;
00854             }
00855         }
00856         return $return;
00857     }

00870     public static function normalize($list, $assoc = true, $sep = ',', $trim = true) {
00871         if (is_string($list)) {
00872             $list = explode($sep, $list);
00873             if ($trim) {
00874                 foreach ($list as $key => $value) {
00875                     $list[$key] = trim($value);
00876                 }
00877             }
00878             if ($assoc) {
00879                 return MOC_Array::normalize($list);
00880             }
00881         } elseif (is_array($list)) {
00882             $keys = array_keys($list);
00883             $count = count($keys);
00884             $numeric = true;
00885 
00886             if (!$assoc) {
00887                 for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {
00888                     if (!is_int($keys[$i])) {
00889                         $numeric = false;
00890                         break;
00891                     }
00892                 }
00893             }
00894             if (!$numeric || $assoc) {
00895                 $newList = array();
00896                 for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {
00897                     if (is_int($keys[$i])) {
00898                         $newList[$list[$keys[$i]]] = null;
00899                     } else {
00900                         $newList[$keys[$i]] = $list[$keys[$i]];
00901                     }
00902                 }
00903                 $list = $newList;
00904             }
00905         }
00906         return $list;
00907     }

00923     public static function combine($data, $path1 = null, $path2 = null, $groupPath = null) {
00924         if (empty($data)) {

00927 
00928         if (is_object($data)) {
00929             $data = get_object_vars($data);
00930         }
00931 
00932         if (is_array($path1)) {
00933             $format = array_shift($path1);
00934             $keys = MOC_Array::format($data, $format, $path1);
00935         } else {
00936             $keys = MOC_Array::extract($data, $path1);
00937         }
00938 
00939         if (!empty($path2) && is_array($path2)) {
00940             $format = array_shift($path2);
00941             $vals = MOC_Array::format($data, $format, $path2);
00942 
00943         } elseif (!empty($path2)) {
00944             $vals = MOC_Array::extract($data, $path2);
00945 
00946         } else {
00947             $count = count($keys);
00948             for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++) {
00949                 $vals[$i] = null;
00950             }
00951         }
00952 
00953         if ($groupPath != null) {
00954             $group = MOC_Array::extract($data, $groupPath);
00955             if (!empty($group)) {
00956                 $c = count($keys);
00957                 for ($i = 0; $i < $c; $i++) {
00958                     if (!isset($group[$i])) {
00959                         $group[$i] = 0;
00960                     }
00961                     if (!isset($out[$group[$i]])) {
00962                         $out[$group[$i]] = array();
00963                     }
00964                     $out[$group[$i]][$keys[$i]] = $vals[$i];
00965                 }
00966                 return $out;
00967             }
00968         }
00969 
00970         return array_combine($keys, $vals);
00971     }
00972 
00981     public static function reverse($object) {
00982         $out = array();
00983         if (is_a($object, 'XmlNode')) {
00984             $out = $object->toArray();
00985             return $out;
00986         } else
00987             if (is_object($object)) {
00988                 $keys = get_object_vars($object);
00989                 if (isset($keys['_name_'])) {
00990                     $identity = $keys['_name_'];
00991                     unset($keys['_name_']);
00992                 }
00993                 $new = array();
00994                 foreach ($keys as $key => $value) {
00995                     if (is_array($value)) {
00996                         $new[$key] = (array )MOC_Array::reverse($value);
00997                     } else {
00998                         if (isset($value->_name_)) {
00999                             $new = array_merge($new, MOC_Array::reverse($value));
01000                         } else {
01001                             $new[$key] = MOC_Array::reverse($value);
01002                         }
01003                     }
01004                 }
01005                 if (isset($identity)) {
01006                     $out[$identity] = $new;
01007                 } else {
01008                     $out = $new;
01009                 }
01010             } elseif (is_array($object)) {
01011                 foreach ($object as $key => $value) {
01012                     $out[$key] = MOC_Array::reverse($value);
01013                 }
01014             } else {
01015                 $out = $object;
01016             }
01017             return $out;
01018     }
01019 
01031     public static function flatten($data, $separator = '.') {
01032         $result = array();
01033         $path = null;
01034 
01035         if (is_array($separator)) {
01036             extract($separator, EXTR_OVERWRITE);
01037         }
01038 
01039         if (!is_null($path)) {
01040             $path .= $separator;
01041         }
01042 
01043         foreach ($data as $key => $val) {
01044             if (is_array($val)) {
01045                 $result += (array )MOC_Array::flatten($val, array('separator' => $separator, 'path' => $path . $key));
01046             } else {
01047                 $result[$path . $key] = $val;
01048             }
01049         }
01050         return $result;
01051     }
01052 
01061     public static function __flatten($results, $key = null) {
01062         $stack = array();
01063         foreach ($results as $k => $r) {
01064             $id = $k;
01065             if (!is_null($key)) {
01066                 $id = $key;
01067             }
01068             if (is_array($r) && count($r)) {
01069                 $stack = array_merge($stack, MOC_Array::__flatten($r, $id));
01070             } else {
01071                 $stack[] = array('id' => $id, 'value' => $r);
01072             }
01073         }
01074         return $stack;
01075     }
01076 
01086     public static function sort($data, $path, $dir) {
01087         $result = MOC_Array::__flatten(MOC_Array::extract($data, $path));
01088         list($keys, $values) = array(MOC_Array::extract($result, '{n}.id'), MOC_Array::extract($result, '{n}.value'));
01089 
01090         $dir = strtolower($dir);
01091         if ($dir === 'asc') {
01092             $dir = SORT_ASC;
01093         } elseif ($dir === 'desc') {
01094             $dir = SORT_DESC;
01095         }
01096         array_multisort($values, $dir, $keys, $dir);
01097         $sorted = array();
01098 
01099         $keys = array_unique($keys);
01100 
01101         foreach ($keys as $k) {
01102             $sorted[] = $data[$k];
01103         }
01104         return $sorted;
01105     }
